name: Sabitra Gyanwali
title: Realtor
bio: As a dedicated Realtor with over 15 years of experience in residential real estate, I bring in-depth knowledge of the local market and a passion for helping families find their perfect home. I pride myself on strong negotiation skills, clear communication, and providing personalized guidance throughout every step of the buying or selling process. My goal is to make every transaction smooth, stress-free, and successful.

name: Lucy Muzhingi
title: Real Estate Broker
bio: As a Real Estate Broker with 10 years of industry experience, I specialize in luxury and investment properties. I use detailed market research and strategic marketing to help my clients make confident and informed decisions. I am committed to delivering exceptional service, maximizing property value, and building long-term professional relationships.

name: Katrina Simon
title: Realtor
bio: With 8 years of experience in residential real estate, I focus on helping clients find homes that match their lifestyle and long-term goals. I believe in attentive service, transparent communication, and building trust with every client I work with. Whether buying or selling, I am dedicated to providing a seamless and rewarding real estate experience.

name: Siten Aryal
title: Realtor
bio: With 12 years of experience in commercial and investment real estate, I help clients identify profitable opportunities and secure the best possible deals. I combine strong market insight with strategic negotiation skills to ensure maximum return on investment. My priority is to guide my clients with honesty, professionalism, and results-driven service.
